name: Proof Logix
description:
Check the raid related progress of yourself and others.

Supports
• Killproof.me
• ArcDPS Bridge (ArcDPS Blish HUD Integration)

account.details: Always required if any other permission is present.

progression.details: Required for checking your weekly clears.

inventories.details: Required for seaching your inventories for kill proofs.

characters.details: Required for seaching your inventories for kill proofs.
